definitions.definition: A cell of the nervous system , which conducts nerve impulses ; consisting of an axon and several dendrites . Neurons are connected by synapses .
A nervure of an insect 's wing .
an artificial neuron ( mathematical function serving as an essential unit of an artificial neural network )

main_definition: ( cytology ) A cell of the nervous system , which conducts nerve impulses ; consisting of an axon and several dendrites . Neurons are connected by synapses .
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) A nervure of an insect 's wing .
( artificial intelligence ) an artificial neuron ( mathematical function serving as an essential unit of an artificial neural network )
